dcterms:description: The Speaker in the Wild (SITW) dataset is used for speaker recognition tasks, providing a diverse set of recordings from various environments.
dcterms:title: Speaker in the Wild (SITW)

dcterms:description: The VOiCES dataset is designed for speaker verification tasks, featuring audio segments from various speakers with a focus on distant speech recognition.
dcterms:title: VOiCES
